data.title: J.M.E. McTaggart by Ramesh K. Sharma
data.meta_description:
This book seeks to critically expound and appraise the thoughts of the foremost British philosopher J.M.E. McTaggart with respect to three principal themes of his philosophy substance self and immortality. Sharma draws on all of McTaggarts major writings to provide a comprehensive exposition of his overall theory of reality.


Condition : New

Author : Ramesh K. Sharma

Weight : 1018

Publisher : Lexington Books

Language : English

EAN : 9780739186756

Format : Hardback

Dimensions : 161 X 236 X 40
data.text:
Product Description

This book seeks to critically expound and appraise the thoughts of the foremost British philosopher J.M.E. McTaggart with respect to three principal themes of his philosophy substance self and immortality. Sharma draws on all of McTaggarts major writings to provide a comprehensive exposition of his overall theory of reality.
